QueryResult.text: select partition_code, child_partition_code from cmn_partitions_flat pfi, cmn_partitions pp, cmn_partitions pc where pc.code = child_partition_code and pp.code = partition_code and pp.is_active = 1 union all select 'NIKU.ROOT' partition_code, code child_partition_code from cmn_partitions p union all select 'NIKU.ROOT' partition_code, 'NIKU.ROOT' child_partition_code from dual
